thing-type.label: Partition
thing-type.description:
The partition is a separated area within the premises protected by the security alarm system.
The subdivision into partitions enables arming/disarming the system only in part of the protected area, as well as limiting access to some portion of the premises to selected users.

parameter.name: forceArming
parameter.label: Force Arming
parameter.description: Forces arming the partition regardless of ongoing troubles and violations.

channel-type.label: Armed
channel-type.description: Active when the partion is armed in any mode or arming is in progress

channel-type.label: Really Armed
channel-type.description: Active when the partion is armed in any mode

channel-type.label: Armed in Mode 1
channel-type.description: Active when the partion is armed in mode 1

channel-type.label: Armed in Mode 2
channel-type.description: Active when the partion is armed in mode 2

channel-type.label: Armed in Mode 3
channel-type.description: Active when the partion is armed in mode 3

channel-type.label: First Code Entered

channel-type.label: Exit Time > 10s
